\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.name: GmailAddOnManifest
\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.description:
Properties customizing the appearance and execution of a
Gmail add-on.

Attributes:
    homepage_trigger (google.apps.script.type.types.HomepageExtensionPoint):
        Defines an endpoint that will be executed in contexts that
        don't match a declared contextual trigger. Any cards
        generated by this function will always be available to the
        user, but may be eclipsed by contextual content when this
        add-on declares more targeted triggers.

        If present, this overrides the configuration from
        ``addOns.common.homepageTrigger``.
    contextual_triggers (MutableSequence[google.apps.script.type.gmail.types.ContextualTrigger]):
        Defines the set of conditions that trigger
        the add-on.
    universal_actions (MutableSequence[google.apps.script.type.gmail.types.UniversalAction]):
        Defines set of `universal
        actions </gmail/add-ons/how-tos/universal-actions>`__ for
        the add-on. The user triggers universal actions from the
        add-on toolbar m

homepage_trigger.description: Defines an endpoint that will be executed in contexts that don't match a declared contextual trigger. Any cards generated by this function will always be available to the user, but may be eclipsed by contextual content when this add-on declares more targeted triggers.  If present, this overrides the configuration from ``addOns.common.homepageTrigger``.

run_function.description: Required. The endpoint to execute when this extension point is activated.

contextual_triggers.description: Defines the set of conditions that trigger the add-on.

on_trigger_function.description: Required. The name of the endpoint to call when a message matches the trigger.

universal_actions.description: Defines set of `universal actions </gmail/add-ons/how-tos/universal-actions>`__ for the add-on. The user triggers universal actions from the add-on toolbar menu.

text.description: Required. User-visible text describing the action, for example, "Add a new contact.".

open_link.description: A link that is opened by Gmail when the user triggers the action.  This field is a member of `oneof`_ ``action_type``.

run_function.description: An endpoint that is called when the user triggers the action. See the `universal actions guide </gmail/add-ons/how-tos/universal-actions>`__ for details.  This field is a member of `oneof`_ ``action_type``.

compose_trigger.description: Defines the compose time trigger for a compose time add-on. This is the trigger that causes an add-on to take action when the user is composing an email. All compose time addons are required to have the gmail.addons.current.action.compose scope even though it might not edit the draft.

actions.description: Defines the set of actions for compose time add-on. These are actions that user can trigger on a compose time addon.

run_function.description: Required. The endpoint to execute when this extension point is activated.

label.description: Required. User-visible text describing the action taken by activating this extension point. For example, "Insert invoice".

logo_url.description: The URL for the logo image shown in the add-on toolbar. If not set, defaults to the add-on's primary logo URL.

draft_access.description: Define the level of data access when a compose time addon is triggered.

authorization_check_function.description: The name of an endpoint that verifies that the add-on has all the required third-party authorizations, by probing the third-party APIs. If the probe fails, the function should throw an exception to initiate the authorization flow. This function is called before each invocation of the add-on, in order to ensure a smooth user experience.

\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.name: UniversalAction
\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.description:
An action that is always available in the add-on toolbar menu
regardless of message context.

This message has `oneof`_ fields (mutually exclusive fields).
For each oneof, at most one member field can be set at the same time.
Setting any member of the oneof automatically clears all other
members.

.. _oneof: https://proto-plus-python.readthedocs.io/en/stable/fields.html#oneofs-mutually-exclusive-fields

Attributes:
    text (str):
        Required. User-visible text describing the
        action, for example, "Add a new contact.".
    open_link (str):
        A link that is opened by Gmail when the user
        triggers the action.

        This field is a member of `oneof`_ ``action_type``.
    run_function (str):
        An endpoint that is called when the user triggers the
        action. See the `universal actions
        guide </gmail/add-ons/how-tos/universal-actions>`__ for
        details.

        This field is a member of `oneof`_ ``action_type``.

text.description: Required. User-visible text describing the action, for example, "Add a new contact.".

open_link.description: A link that is opened by Gmail when the user triggers the action.  This field is a member of `oneof`_ ``action_type``.

run_function.description: An endpoint that is called when the user triggers the action. See the `universal actions guide </gmail/add-ons/how-tos/universal-actions>`__ for details.  This field is a member of `oneof`_ ``action_type``.

\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.name: ComposeTrigger
\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.description:
A trigger that activates when user is composing an email.

Attributes:
    actions (MutableSequence[google.apps.script.type.types.MenuItemExtensionPoint]):
        Defines the set of actions for compose time
        add-on. These are actions that user can trigger
        on a compose time addon.
    draft_access (google.apps.script.type.gmail.types.ComposeTrigger.DraftAccess):
        Define the level of data access when a
        compose time addon is triggered.

actions.description: Defines the set of actions for compose time add-on. These are actions that user can trigger on a compose time addon.

run_function.description: Required. The endpoint to execute when this extension point is activated.

label.description: Required. User-visible text describing the action taken by activating this extension point. For example, "Insert invoice".

logo_url.description: The URL for the logo image shown in the add-on toolbar. If not set, defaults to the add-on's primary logo URL.

draft_access.description: Define the level of data access when a compose time addon is triggered.

\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.name: ContextualTrigger
\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.description:
Defines a trigger that fires when the open email meets a
specific criteria. When the trigger fires, it executes a
specific endpoint, usually in order to create new cards and
update the UI.


.. _oneof: https://proto-plus-python.readthedocs.io/en/stable/fields.html#oneofs-mutually-exclusive-fields

Attributes:
    unconditional (google.apps.script.type.gmail.types.UnconditionalTrigger):
        UnconditionalTriggers are executed when any
        mail message is opened.

        This field is a member of `oneof`_ ``trigger``.
    on_trigger_function (str):
        Required. The name of the endpoint to call
        when a message matches the trigger.

unconditional.description: UnconditionalTriggers are executed when any mail message is opened.  This field is a member of `oneof`_ ``trigger``.

on_trigger_function.description: Required. The name of the endpoint to call when a message matches the trigger.

\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.name: UnconditionalTrigger
\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.description: A trigger that fires when any email message is opened.
